varz.util module¶

class varz.util.Initialiser[source]¶

Bases: object

Variable initialiser.

assign(name, values)[source]¶

Assign values to a particular variable.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – Name of variables.
  • values (list[tensor]) – List of values to assign.
generate(vs)[source]¶

Generate initialisers.

Parameters:vs (vars.Vars) – Variable storage.
Returns:List of functions that perform the initialisations.
Return type:list[function]
